Text: Re Studies I do still have my file from the two meetings in which I participated with you to discuss the Omaha office Ill have someone bring it to your office this morning and you can copy from it anything you need Attached are the electronic copies of our flip charts from those meetings Let me know if I can help further Regards Roger Rod Hayslett AM To Roger NRON cc Subject Studies Did you keep any of the studies that Mary Ann and I worked on on closing down the Omaha Office I am interested in resurrecting that study
